mapper.select: SELECT "customer"."customerId", "customer"."customerName", "customer"."point", COALESCE(SUM("customerPickCoupon"."remainingCouponCount"), 0) AS "returnCoupon", CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM "customerPickCoupon" WHERE "customerPickCoupon"."customerId" = "customer"."customerId" AND "customerPickCoupon"."isSubscription" = true ) THEN true ELSE false END AS "pickSubscription", COALESCE(SUM("ecoCareCount"."couponCount"), 0) AS "saveEarth", "customerFreeDelivery"."deliverySubscription" FROM "customer" LEFT JOIN "customerPickCoupon" ON "customerPickCoupon"."customerId" = "customer"."customerId" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT "customerId", COUNT(*) AS "couponCount" FROM "pickup" GROUP BY "customerId" ) AS "ecoCareCount" ON "ecoCareCount"."customerId" = "customer"."customerId" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT "customerId", MIN("startDateTime") AS "deliverySubscription" FROM "customerFreeDelivery" GROUP BY "customerId" ORDER BY "deliverySubscription" ) AS "customerFreeDelivery" ON "customerFreeDelivery"."customerId" = "customer"."customerId" WHERE "customer"."customerId" = cast(#{customerId} as UUID) GROUP BY "customer"."customerId", "customer"."customerName", "customer"."point", "ecoCareCount"."couponCount", "customerFreeDelivery"."deliverySubscription"

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery JOIN "deliveryProduct" ON delivery."deliveryId" = "deliveryProduct"."deliveryId" JOIN product ON "deliveryProduct"."productId" = product."productId" LEFT OUTER JOIN "productMainImage" ON "deliveryProduct"."productId" = "productMainImage"."productId" JOIN customer ON delivery."customerId" = customer."customerId" WHERE delivery."customerId" = cast(#{customerId} as UUID) AND (delivery."purchaseDateTime" >= to_timestamp(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00.00') AND delivery."purchaseDateTime" <= to_timestamp(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS'))
AND (product.brand LIKE #{searchWord} OR product."pName" LIKE #{searchWord})

AND (product.brand LIKE #{searchWord} OR product."pName" LIKE #{searchWord})
